block.p: STISKIN-Judith, 29. On Monday May 14, 2001 of Hazlet, NJ. Beloved wife of Scott Faranello. Adored daughter of Jacqueline (nee Rose) and Marvin Stiskin. Dear sister of Robin Stiskin and the late Gerald Stiskin. Judy Stiskin appeared in The European Tour of ''Hair'' and The North American Tour of ''Smokey Joe's Cafe.'' Funeral Services conducted from the Menorah Chapels at Millburn, 2950 Vauxhall Road, Union, NJ on Thursday, May 17, 2001 at 11:30 AM. Interment Mt. Moriah Cemetery, Fairview, New Jersey.
